quote: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Intelligence minus purpose equals stupidity.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: Intelligence entails a strong mind, but genius entails a heart of a lion in tune with a strong mind.
author: Criss Jami,  Diotima, Battery, Electric Personality

quote: Intelligence alone is not nearly enough when it comes to acting wisely.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  Crime and Punishment

quote: Intelligence is the capacity to perceive the essential, the what is; and to awaken this capacity, in oneself and in others, is education.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti,  Education and the Significance of Life

quote: Intelligence plus character-that is the goal of true education.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: To quote the exceptional teacher Marva Collins, "I will is more important than IQ."It is wonderful to have a terrific mind, but it's been my experience that having outstanding intelligence is a very small part of the total package that leads to success and happiness. Discipline, hard work, perserverance, and generosity of spirit are, in the final analysis, far more important.
author: Rafe Esquith,  There Are No Shortcuts

quote: You are intelligent if you know what you do not know.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Sex is mathematics. Individuality no longer an issue. What does intelligence signify? Define reason. Desire - meaningless. Intellect is not a cure. Justice is dead.
author: Bret Easton Ellis

quote: It is not clear that intelligence has any long-term survival value.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: An intelligent man is one who acknowledges his intelligence as that of those who surround him.
author: Ilyas Kassam

quote: Sculpture is the art of the intelligence.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Education is no substitute for intelligence.
author: Frank Herbert

quote: Many much-learned men have no intelligence.
author: Democritus

quote: An intelligent woman is a goldmine! She has the ability to learn, reason and understand things better and faster than her contemporaries. She is competent, alert and can reason out stuffs easily.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: My success was not based so much on any great intelligence but on great common sense.
author: Helen Gurley Brown

quote: Wit seduces by signaling intelligence without nerdiness.
author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb,  The Bed of Procrustes: Philosophical and Practical Aphorisms

quote: By definition, intelligence deals with the unclear, the unknown, the deliberately hidden. What the enemies of the United States hope to deny we work to reveal.
author: George Tenet

quote: The intelligent have plans; the wise have principles.
author: Raheel Farooq

quote: Improving intelligence is possible, but it is more likely to occur if children are given the right experiences at the right ages.
author: Dennis Garlick

quote: My favourite definition of an intellectual: 'Someone who has been educated beyond his/her intelligence.[Sources and Acknowledgements: Chapter 19]
author: Arthur C. Clarke,  3001: The Final Odyssey

quote: The ability to speak does not make you intelligent.
author: George Lucas

quote: Nature never appeals to intelligence until habit and instinct are useless. There is no intelligence where there is no need of change.
author: H.G. Wells,  The Time Machine

quote: Our care of the child should be governed, not by the desire to make him learn things, but by the endeavor always to keep burning within him that light which is called intelligence.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: An intellectual? Yes. And never deny it. An intellectual is someone whose mind watches itself. I like this, because I am happy to be both halves, the watcher and the watched. "Can they be brought together?"This is a practical question. We must get down to it. "I despise intelligence"really means: "I cannot bear my doubts.
author: Albert Camus

quote: An ability to look into the confusing mess of life and see things for what they are.
author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay

quote: There is no reason to assume that the universe has the slightest interest in intelligence—or even in life. Both may be random accidental by-products of its operations like the beautiful patterns on a butterfly's wings. The insect would fly just as well without them.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: There is a road from the eye to the heart that does not go through the intellect.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Genius is an exceedingly common human quality, probably natural to most of us.
author: John Taylor Gatto

quote: An intelligent person looks for problems to solve. The wise person looks for solutions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: But if one observes, one will see that the body has its own intelligence; it requires a great deal of intelligence to observe the intelligence of the body.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti,  The Flight of the Eagle

quote: A genius is simply one who has taken full possession of his own mind and directed it toward objectives of his own choosing, without permitting outside influences to discourage or mislead him.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Watch out for intellect,because it knows so much it knows nothingand leaves you hanging upside down,mouthing knowledge as your heartfalls out of your mouth.
author: Anne Sexton,  The Complete Poems

quote: It doesn't matter how smart you are unless you stop and think.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: I find intelligence sexy. I find a sense of humor sexy. I find sensitivity sexy.
author: Nicole Appleton

quote: belief is the death of intelligence.
author: Robert Anton Wilson,  Cosmic Trigger: Die letzten Geheimnisse der Illuminaten oder An den Grenzen des erweiterten Bewusstseins

quote: Your "I CAN"is more important than your IQ.
author: Robin S. Sharma,  The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari

quote: Cleverness is not wisdom.
author: Euripides,  The Bacchae

quote: Knowing others is intelligence;knowing yourself is true wisdom.Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power.
author: Lao Tzu,  Tao Te Ching

quote: Genius is an inner inherent intuition and perception. It is not a teachable condition.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Intelligent men are dangerous.
author: Patricia Briggs,  Dragon Bones

quote: Intellect is a part of a good faith. Intellect is the light, the heart is the direction.
author: Tariq Ramadan

quote: In our civilization, and under our republican form of government, intelligence is so highly honored that it is rewarded by exemption from the cares of office.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: LearningTo believe you are magnificent. And gradually to discover that you are not magnificent. Enough labor for one human life.
author: Czesław Miłosz

quote: Success in almost any field depends more on energy and drive than it does on intelligence. This explains why we have so many stupid leaders.
author: Sloan Wilson

quote: Nobody is smarter than you are. And what if they are? What good is their understanding doing you?
author: Terence McKenna

quote: You think intelligence and grit can succeed by themselves, but I'm telling you that's a pretty illusion.
author: Nancy Kress,  Steal Across the Sky

quote: The learnin' mind is the livin' mind... an' any sort o' smart is truesome smart, old smart or new, high smart or low.
author: David Mitchell,  Cloud Atlas

quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
author: H. L. Mencken
